267d7214e1c4.description: The Bullshit Artists at Bullshit.ist are calling bullshit on everything. W/ Art, laughter, tears, hugs, smiles, gifs, memes, jokes, honesty, love, smirks, kisses, hilarity, giggles, tickles, seriousness, joy, sport, silliness, dancing, mirth, philosophy, gratitidue and pleasure.
267d7214e1c4.name: BullshitIst

paragraphs.name: f920
paragraphs.text: But really. When you scrape off that thin, fucking brittle, fucking useless veneer of Civility and Restraint, my head is a Frothing Cauldron of Blistering Hatreds, Suspicions Extending Into Infinity Along Every Axis, and Heart-Hammering Terrors of Every Description. The ONLY remedy — if any one of you idiots so much as murmurs the word “yoga” I will cut you in half lengthwise — I have ever found to offer fleeting relief is the blessed state of interstitial being permitted by lighting up a cigarette and drawing that Alleviating Goodness as deep into my lungs as a single breath would permit.

paragraphs.name: 26ef
paragraphs.text: If you look along the leeward wall of any office park when the snows are blowing horizontal, or outside any loading dock in the pissing rain, you will find us — valiantly puffing away so as not to open all your fucking heads like so many pomegranates. Our concern for YOU prompts us to poison OURSELVES. And, instead of being a little bit fucking grateful that we are not in a Sustained Campaign of Liberating Your Idiot Tongues From the Prison of Your Mouths, you shun us. You drive us outside, into the Indifferent and Chastening Embrace of the Elements. WHEN WE ARE CLEARLY NOT OUTDOOR PEOPLE IN THE FIRST FUCKING PLACE.

paragraphs.name: ced6
paragraphs.text: You Michelob Ultra fascists with your narrow waists and your active lifestyles, you fertility goddess fuckwads with your Concern For the Children, you public health wonks intent on Extending Our Lifespans For No Good Goddamn Reason — all of you. Now look at us. We’re all like an ass-hair away from meat-cleavering our way through the fucking office till the SWAT team rappels down the side of the fucking building and mows us down.

paragraphs.name: c6d4
paragraphs.text: The clock of our culture, which currently stands at like a quarter to Hunger Games was set by you. You fucking fuckers, with your admonishments, with your wholesale rebuke of us — it is you who have moved the hands of that clock toward our mutual immolation. We just wanted to sit at our fucking desks like civilized fucking people, inhaling the overwhelming majority of the poison FOR YOU UNTHANKFUL FUCK BUCKETS. All we asked in return — for us to refrain from Purge-bashing your heads in with a 9-iron so they detonate like a honeydew with a grenade tucked inside — was to breathe in a LITTLE bit of slow-acting poison along with us. But could you fucking do it? No. You couldn’t. You miserly fucking dickholes.
Hahahaha hahahaha 😂😂🤣🤣🤣🤣
paragraphs.name: 4c2e

cc8a190596d0.title: Every year I attend a demolition derby at our county fair.

paragraphs.text: Every year I attend a demolition derby at our county fair. One evening I was sitting in the grandstand watching the derby in progress. The announcer was repeating his routine. At that moment two cars were involved in a spectacular and heavily damaging crash. The vehicles were emitting clouds of oil smoke, radiator fluid fumes, and whatever other…

virtuals.subtitle: In this particular instance, purely by coincidence, the announcer had just reached the point in his routine where he said, “…and remember…

content.subtitle: In this particular instance, purely by coincidence, the announcer had just reached the point in his routine where he said, “…and remember…

788f732aba06.title: The smoking issue is a small part of the broader issue of individual freedoms.

paragraphs.text: The smoking issue is a small part of the broader issue of individual freedoms. The Liberal ideology doesn’t trust individuals with their liberties, and instead wants to give our government all our liberties in order to enshrine their beliefs into law. All laws, to one degree or another, take away some of our liberties. Some laws are reasonable…

861aaaeb42f.title: Well I could not wait 19 years to reply.

paragraphs.text: Well I could not wait 19 years to reply.

That was very funny. I have never smoked but I do notice the look of extreme satisfaction on those of my friends who do, when they have been indoors for hours and finally get a chance to go out and light up. I also don’t care if someone smokes next to me. It isn't going to harm me any more than the toxins already in the air in any modern city.

Look, I think there are real concerns for the health of people smoking three or more…

fd4de46a2749.title: You almost struck a chord with me.

paragraphs.text: You almost struck a chord with me. Almost. Ironically, I quit smoking 15 years ago next month. I smoked cigarettes for 42 years blissful years — all my life to that point if you count the second-hand smoke in my home from my parents who both smoked. Then I started working at the world famous Mayo Clinic where smoking was frowned on/upon by the clinic…
